title: Animals In My Pocket!
description: What do you see when you look into your pocket? Is it a tiger or turtle or maybe a monkey? For one little boy, thatâ€™s exactly what he sees. Come find out what other animals might be lurking in his pocket. Animals In My Pocket is a great picture book full of rhyme, repetition and bright colorful pictures that will appeal to young readers.
author: N.V. Smith
